title: Marketing Assistant
salary: $1200 USD/ month, $500 Yearly Tech Allowance, 13th Month Pay, Paid Time Off
job_overview:
We are a manufacturer of high-quality architectural door hardware seeking a proactive Marketing Assistant with expertise in digital marketing and SEO to support our creative designers and marketing directors. As we embark on setting up a new website, we need a skilled professional to assist with SEO strategies, content creation, and online brand positioning. The ideal candidate will have a keen eye for detail, and a passion for digital marketing.

>>> IMPORTANT! USE OF TIME TRACKING IS IMPLEMENTED UNTIL FULLY ONBOARDED

WORK SCHEDULE:
11:30am - 8:00pm Monday to Friday AET (GMT+11)

COMPENSATION PACKAGE:
- $1200 USD / Month
- 13th Month Pay
- $500 Yearly Tech Allowance
- Paid Time Off

RESPONSIBILITIES:
- Assist in developing and executing marketing campaigns across multiple channels (website, social media, email, etc.).
- Conduct SEO research, keyword analysis, and optimization to improve website rankings and organic traffic, specifically in the architectural hardware industry.
- Work closely with our creative designers to ensure marketing materials align with brand identity and technical product specifications.
- Manage and schedule social media content to showcase our premium architectural door hardware and monitor engagement.
- Assist in writing and optimizing website content, blog posts, and product descriptions that highlight the technical and aesthetic aspects of our products.
- Research industry trends, competitors, and best practices to keep marketing strategies up-to-date and competitive in the architectural and construction markets.
- Support the team with email marketing campaigns
- Assist with website product data management, ensuring all product listings are accurate and complete
- Work with the ERP system to update and maintain product data, descriptions, and pricing to ensure seamless integration with the website.
- Perform other administrative and marketing support tasks as required.


QUALIFICATIONS:
- 1-3 years of experience in digital marketing, SEO, or a related role.
- Basic knowledge of graphic design tools (Canva, Adobe Photoshop, Illustrator) is a plus.
- Understanding of PPC advertising (Google Ads, Facebook Ads) is a plus.
- Passion for branding, architectural design, and staying ahead of digital marketing trends.
- Experience in B2B marketing, particularly within the manufacturing or architectural hardware sector.
- Strong understanding of SEO principles, keyword research, and optimization techniques.
- Proficiency in Google Analytics, Google Search Console, and SEO tools (e.g., SEMrush, Ahrefs, Moz).
- Experience with social media platforms (Instagram, Facebook, LinkedIn, YouTube, TikTok, etc.) and scheduling tools (e.g., Hootsuite, Buffer).
- Knowledge of email marketing tools (Mailchimp, HubSpot, Klaviyo) and campaign management.
- Ability to write engaging and optimized content for digital platforms, with a focus on technical product marketing.
- Strong communication and organizational skills.
- Ability to multitask, meet deadlines, and work independently in a remote setting.
- A keen eye for detail and a creative mindset.
